InstructionData.Title: Proportional Setting
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Proportional Setting 1.1​ # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library​ # Controls up to 5 devices​ alias PID d0​ ​ alias pidout r5​ alias deviceCount r6​ alias index r0​ alias temp r10​ alias t1 r11​ ​ move deviceCount 5 ​ start:​ yield​ l pidout PID Setting​ move index 1​ loop:​ sle temp index deviceCount​ blez temp start​ jal setdev​ j loop​ ​ setdev:​ sle temp pidout 0​ bgtz temp off​ mod t1 pidout 100​ s dr0 On 1​ s dr0 Setting t1​ done:​ sub pidout pidout 100​ add index index 1​ j ra​ ​ off:​ s dr0 On 0​ s dr0 Setting 0​ j done
